title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated license management documentation to use new reusable `license-tab-ghes` across multiple files, replacing `license-tab`.
Enhanced license download steps with new UI instructions and added guidance for generating new licenses when usage changes.
Improved license sync process documentation, including troubleshooting for missing sync buttons.
Refined license upload instructions with clearer UI references and cross-version (GHEC/GHES) documentation links.
Updated GHAS committer view and license usage reports to align with new navigation paths.
Added new reusable file `license-tab-ghes.md` and removed outdated `license-tab.md`.
Updated binary image `upload-license.png` reflecting UI changes.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated license management documentation to use new reusable `license-tab-ghes` across multiple files, replacing `license-tab`.
- Enhanced license download steps with new UI instructions and added guidance for generating new licenses when usage changes.
- Improved license sync process documentation, including troubleshooting for missing sync buttons.
- Refined license upload instructions with clearer UI references and cross-version (GHEC/GHES) documentation links.
- Updated GHAS committer view and license usage reports to align with new navigation paths.
- Added new reusable file `license-tab-ghes.md` and removed outdated `license-tab.md`.
- Updated binary image `upload-license.png` reflecting UI changes.
